title: Inovent Shareholding Monitoring Procedure  | Yönerge
text: Procedure No S1410-0101-V02 Effective Date 29-04-2024 Update Date 04-07-2025 Related Unit / Owner IE / İnovasyon ve Girişimciliği Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Aim This Procedure is issued to define the conditions and implementation steps for monitoring the operational and financial status of affiliates in which the University holds shares through Inovent Inc. Scope Covers all affiliates in which Inovent Inc. is a shareholder. Definitions / Abbreviations IGI: Innovation and Entrepreneurship Initiative Directorate MI: Finance Directorate HUKUK: Legal Directorate Implementation Steps Step Responsibility Outputs / Timing 1. The Company Tracking Form is sent by e‑mail to all Inovent affiliates to request their data. IGI / MI For the 6th and 12th months of each year, within 30 days following the corporate tax calendar. 2. Based on collected data, a single‑page affiliate tracking report is prepared for each affiliate. IGI / MI In line with the IGI Committee schedule. 3. The prepared reports are shared with members of the Innovation and Entrepreneurship Committee . IGI As soon as reports are ready. 4. At the Committee’s request, a special‑agenda meeting may be held to discuss the status of affiliates. The decision to divest or continue with the affiliate is taken during this meeting. IGI At any time deemed appropriate by the Committee. 5. For affiliates from which data could not be obtained, the data is requested again . IGI One (1) month after the initial request. 6. If data still cannot be obtained, the matter is referred to the Legal Directorate . HUKUK Two (2) months after the initial request. Related Forms Related Form Links
